title: Tag Hierachy and Table of Contents
text:
; How display the tag tree for three levels of tag hierachy? : The below code uses three nested `list` widget to show the tag tree up to level 3. This procedure can be used to create table of contents. A customized numbered list is used (ref: [[Tobias Beer|https://tobibeer.github.io/tb5/#Advanced%20Numbered%20Lists]]) <$macrocall $name="wikitext-example-without-html" src="""
    <$list filter="[tag[$:/.mr/toc]]" variable="maintag">
  1. <$link to=<> ><$text text=<>/>
      <$list filter="[tag]" variable="level1">
    1. <$link to=<> ><$text text=<>/>
        <$list filter="[tag]" variable="level2">
      1. <$link to=<> ><$text text=<>/>
"""/>
creator: Mohammad
